lead_paragraph: Rob Andrew has resigned as the Rugby Football Union's director of professional rugby and will step down at the end of the season, the RFU announced on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Andrew to Step Down From RFU Post, Melville Replaces Him
headline.main: Andrew to Step Down From RFU Post, Melville Replaces Him

snippet: Rob Andrew has resigned as the Rugby Football Union's director of professional rugby and will step down at the end of the season, the RFU announced on Friday....
